short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick links to Drop Box, Box, Google Drive, Mediafire, 4shared, and many more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
By clicking this extension, you will see links to...

DropBox
Box
SugarSync
OneDrive
Google Drive
4Shared
MEGA
MediaFire
Yandex
Amazon S3
EVERNOTE
hubiC

Links may be reordered and hidden to each user's liking.

If you have any questions, comments, or suggestions, fell free to email me at miachrome.rr@gmail.com and thank you for viewing my extension!
